desc: A complete solution, the AI-enabled FinTech B2B Invoice Management Application uses Flask as the backend framework for providing machine learning models. The application effortlessly incorporates a Flask-powered model to estimate invoice order amounts, revolutionising financial operations for businesses with React.js as the front end, MySQL as the database, and Material UI with Tailwind CSS for UI design.

During the 8 weeks of the Virtual Internship, I have completed the following Salesforce Trailhead modules: Salesforce Fundamentals, Organizational Setup, Relationship & Process Automation, Types Of Flows & Security, Apex, Testing & Debugging, VS Code Setup & CLI Setup, Lightning Web Components (LWC) & API, Developer Super Set
